code: import React from'react';import'./EventCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventCard=_ref=>{let{event}=_ref;const formatDate=dateString=>{const options={year:'numeric',month:'long',day:'numeric',hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'};return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('fr-FR',options);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"event-image",children:event.image_url?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:event.image_url,alt:event.title}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"event-image-placeholder",children:"\uD83D\uDCC5"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:event.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"event-date",children:["\uD83D\uDCC6 ",formatDate(event.date)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"event-location",children:["\uD83D\uDCCD ",event.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"event-description",children:event.description}),event.max_participants&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"event-participants",children:["\uD83D\uDC65 Places disponibles: ",event.max_participants]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"S'inscrire \xE0 l'\xE9v\xE9nement"})]})]});};export default EventCard;
